mapper.select:
SELECT * from (
SELECT b.username username, b.tripState tripState, e.projectName, e.designPhase, a.taskLevel, c.startTime, c.stopTime, c.currentProcess, a.role from user_project a, user b, project c, projectSummary e where
a.userId = b.id and a.projectId = c.id and c.projectSummaryId = e.id and c.departmentId = #{departmentId} and (a.deltag <> '1' or a.deltag is null) and (b.deltag <> '1' or b.deltag is null) and (c.deltag <> '1' or c.deltag is null) and (e.deltag <> '1' or e.deltag is null) union
SELECT u.username, u.tripState, ps.projectName, ps.designPhase, p.taskLevel, p.startTime, p.stopTime, p.currentProcess, 'principal'
from user u, project p, projectSummary ps
where u.id = p.principalId and p.projectSummaryId = ps.id and p.departmentId = #{departmentId} and (u.deltag <> '1' or u.deltag is null) and (p.deltag <> '1' or p.deltag is null) and (ps.deltag <> '1' or ps.deltag is null)
union
SELECT u.username, u.tripState, ps.projectName, ps.designPhase, p.taskLevel, p.startTime, p.stopTime, p.currentProcess, 'chiefEngineer'
from user u, project p, projectSummary ps
where u.id = p.chiefEngineerId and p.projectSummaryId = ps.id and p.departmentId = #{departmentId} and (u.deltag <> '1' or u.deltag is null) and (p.deltag <> '1' or p.deltag is null) and (ps.deltag <> '1' or ps.deltag is null)
order by username asc ) temp
where username like "%"#{searchKey}"%"
